format.name: Tagged Image File Format for Internet Fax (TIFF-FX)
format.summary: Removed identification signatures in response to findings from The National Library of New Zealand and Tessella. Previous signature is reliant on the existence of the 'NewSubFileType' tag, however this is not the exclusive domain of TIFF-FX and was therefore resulting in false-positive identification.

format.name: JTIP (JPEG Tiled Image Pyramid)
format.summary: Removed .jpg as an external signature to avoid 'false-positive' identification of files with a .jpg extension which do not match any known binary signatures. This means that JPEG files that do not conform to any known signature will no longer incorrectly default to JTIP.
